title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 138.2 - Items in distributable net income
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 138.2 - Items in distributable net income

State Regulations

Tax Law, ยง 638(a)(1)

The share of an estate or trust in its distributable net
income from New York State sources is the amount, if any, by which such
distributable net income from New York State sources exceeds the aggregate of
the shares therein of all its beneficiaries. Such share of the estate or trust
and the applicable modifications are determined under Part 139 of this

Article. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
138.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
